Yousef Ourabi wrote:
> Hello:
> I sent a somewhat similar email to this list yesterday that seems to 
> have been blocked due to the attached patches? Ignore that one if it 
> ends up making it to the list as I've slightly changed the way I 
> tweaked things. Both issues are resolved on my local build, could 
> someone (St.Ack?) take a quick look through the patch(es) and see if 
> they are up to snuff (There might be architectural considerations I've 
> failed to take into account). If they are not, share your thoughts and 
> I'll try to comply :-)

For 1517693, (and admittedly this is a hack), I used 
org.htmlparser.util.Translate.  You may be able to use the code there as 
a reference.

http://htmlparser.sourceforge.net/javadoc/org/htmlparser/util/Translate.html

Will.
